GULF OF GUINEA.
SAO TOME AND PRINCIPE.
DNC 01.
1. M/V ATTACKED IN 01-08.08N 006-09.31E
   AT 070028Z NOV. VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP
   CLEAR OF THIS POSITION AND TO EXERCISE EXTREME
   CAUTION.
   REPORTS TO NAVAREA II,
   PHONE: 332 9822 8888, 332 5631 2424,
   FAX: 332 5631 2584,
   E-MAIL: WATCHKEEPERS@MDAT-GOG.ORG,
   coord.navarea2@shom.fr.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 140206Z NOV 19.
